#summary Using maven-scm-provider-svnjava with Maven
#labels Featured,Phase-Support

= Introduction =

This is a quick guide to using the pure-java svn provider with maven.

= Details =

To use with maven, add this to your pom or a parent pom, in the {{{<build>/<plugins>}}}
section:
{{{
<plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-scm-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>1.3</version>
    <configuration>
        <providerImplementations>
            <svn>javasvn</svn>
        </providerImplementations>
    </configuration>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.maven-scm-provider-svnjava</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-scm-provider-svnjava</artifactId>
            <version>1.9</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
</plugin>
}}}
